name: Vampire Hidden Object Games – Sacred Relic Hunt
name_original: Vampire Hidden Object Games – Sacred Relic Hunt
description:
Survive the night in a vampires' castle and escape it before dawn! They want you to find a sacred relic that will help them walk in the sunshine. Find it if you want to stay alive! Play 🦇 Vampire Hidden Object Games – Sacred Relic Hunt 🦇 and start the most amazing adventure in your life. This is the best seek and find hidden object game and a perfect brain teaser that will make you feel completely amused all day. Find the diary with important information or their journals and chronicles in order to find missing objects that will help you in your secret quest.

🧛 Vampire Hidden Object Games – Sacred Relic Hunt features:

🔍 Horror vampire game free localized into 15 languages!
🏆 More than 1000 hidden objects to find in this haunted castle!
🔍 Multiple levels with mystery places full of hidden objects!
🏆 Scary vampire 3D game design that will leave you speechless!
🔍 Find the hidden figure from the card below & click on it!
🏆 Click on the magnifying glass button to use help!
🔍 For mobile phones only! - Zoom in the picture to find the objects!
🏆 Move the picture when it is zoomed to find the hidden objects!
🔍 Zoom out at any moment to see the mystery scene again!

🧛 Additional mystery hidden object game features: 🧛

🔍 Picture search for finding missing objects quickly and easily!
🏆 Silhouette hidden object – a challenging level for finding items!
🔍 Word scramble game level – a hard level to find hidden figures!
🏆 Flashlight or a night mode level – use the light to find items!
🔍 Match Pairs – a new brain teaser memory game with cards!
🏆 Find the Difference – a vampire game to spot the difference between pics!
🔍 Time limit game - bonus level to train your brain and concentration!
🏆 Puzzle game – put the puzzle pieces together to make a picture!

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Webelinx.Hidden.Object.Games/
Follow us on VK: https://vk.com/igripoiskpredmetov

If you are a fan of horror vampire and zombie games and you like mystery adventures and werewolf stories with other spooky creatures and monsters, you are in the right place. Vampire Hidden Object Games – Sacred Relic Hunt is definitely going to be your favorite new game 2019. Walk into the mysterious vampire world and spot hidden objects in pictures. Try not to become a vampire yourself. Do what you are told to do and escape the castle of horrors. You will get the list of the hidden objects you have to find, spot the items and collect them.

Search for hidden objects in a haunted house, cemetery and vampire's castle!

If you want to survive you have to become a vampire hunter. Try to trick them. Don't find all the missing items, escape before you find a secret relic. Nobody wants the vampires to walk in the daylight. This is not a vampire love story people want to hear. Play Vampire Hidden Object Games – Sacred Relic Hunt, enjoy the fabulously designed scenes that will leave you out of breath. This is one of the most popular mystery games with vampire theme you can find on the market. Check up your concentration and test your focus while you try to spot the hidden objects. Amazing scary sound effects will make a fantastic eerie atmosphere that will make your new gaming experience unforgettable.

Reveal the vampire secrets! Find missing objects and hidden figures and become a survivor!

Do you want to become immortal and be afraid of a daylight or you still want to be a human being? It is up to you! Watch out, thirsty vampires are all around you, waiting for you to make a mistake. They will keep you alive if you find them a missing relic. Seek and find hidden objects to find it. Or become a vampire slayer and fight for your life. Play “Vampire Hidden Object Games – Sacred Relic Hunt” free seek and find game full version 2019 and enjoy the thrilling vampire story. Challenge your brain, pass the levels and become a hero!
